name: Keyboard Warrior (itch)
description:
Had a lot of fun making this.

Just type attack to attack and block to block.

I only have a North American wasd keyboard, so I can't guarantee this will work on any other type of keyboard (it probably won't, but feel free to give it a go or even play with the source yourself if you're so inclined!)

Source: https://github.com/KirklandLandry/procjam2016
